items.name: Central Rock
items.description: A large rock with strange markings, maybe useful.

items.name: Arena Dust
items.description: Fine dust kicked up from the ground.

items.name: Swamp Stick
items.description: A soggy stick that might be useful.

items.name: Muddy Boot
items.description: An old boot covered in mud.

items.name: Burnt Leaf
items.description: A leaf charred by flames.

items.name: Smoke Pouch
items.description: A small pouch filled with ash.

items.name: Lightning Stone
items.description: A rock charged by a lightning bolt.

items.name: Thunder Shell
items.description: A cracked shell that vibrates faintly.

items.name: Dried Fruit
items.description: A small piece of fruit, dried by the heat.

items.name: Parched Leaf
items.description: A brown, brittle leaf.

items.name: Water Bottle
items.description: A half-full bottle of water.

items.name: Wet Sand
items.description: Sand damp from the nearby water.

items.name: Bee Smoke Canister
items.description: Used to calm bees.

items.name: Honey Comb
items.description: A small piece of honeycomb.

items.name: Flashlight
items.description: A small flashlight with low battery.

items.name: Fog Mask
items.description: Helps you breathe in thick fog.

items.name: Camouflage Cloth
items.description: Helps you blend in with trees.

items.name: Quiet Boots
items.description: Muffles your footsteps.

items.name: Tribute Token
items.description: A small metal token dropped by a fallen tribute.

items.name: Cannon Shell
items.description: A spent shell casing.

items.name: Sleep Flower
items.description: Smells sweet but may be dangerous.

items.name: Poison Berry
items.description: A berry with a bitter taste.

items.name: Tracker Jacker Repellent
items.description: A strong-smelling substance to keep bugs away.

items.name: Sting Salve
items.description: Soothes bug stings.

items.name: Broken Map
items.description: A torn piece of a map showing part of the arena.

items.name: Rusty Compass
items.description: An old compass that still points north.
